  <header class="biz-home-header">
   <div class="grid-container home-header-content">
    <div class="row">
     <div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-8 xlarge-7">
      <div class="header-copy">
       <h1 class="main">
        PDF Productivity and eSigning, All in One Place
       </h1>
       <h4 class="sub">
        With our latest Nitro Productivity Suite, your business can streamline document workflows, eliminate unnecessary printing, lower costs, and work 100% digitally.
       </h4>
       <a class="button primary" href="/business/download">
        Get started for free »
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="devices">
     </div>
    </div>

      </path>

   <div class="grid-container header-quote-section">
    <div class="quote-row">
     <div class="row align-center">
      <div class="small-11 medium-8 columns quote-container">
       <div class="quote">
        <h4>
         Nitro products are feature-rich and extremely user-friendly, and we saw a significant impact on user productivity.”
        </h4>
       </div>
       <div class="author-container">
        <div class="image-container">
         <img alt="Aiden Curran - Howden" src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/cf-nitroengassets-prod/express/_global/headshots/Aiden+Curran.png"/>

          </strong>

  <section id="featured-content">
   <div class="darken-background grid-container first">
    <div class="split-row">
     <div class="split-block left-block">

        <div class="copy-container">
         <h4>
          Equip more employees at lower cost
         </h4>
         <p>
          With straightforward licensing and affordable pricing, it’s finally possible to provide more employees with PDF productivity tools and eSigning for more efficient digital workflows.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

        </div>
        <div class="copy-container">
         <h4>
          Solve some of the most common inefficiencies
         </h4>
         <p>
          By enabling 100% digital document workflows, Nitro helps knowledge workers be more productive by bypassing common bottlenecks like printing and scanning.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="columns small-12 medium-4">
      <div class="gradient-block block-3">
       <div class="block-content">

          <path d="M38.85,64.08c-1.66.5-3.31,1-4.88,1.4-2.43.65-4.92,1.24-7.33,1.82l-.18,0c-3.78.9-8.17,2-12.53,2.94-1.08.25-1.14.21-1.52-.9-.08-.26-3.49-12.79-4.86-18C6.08,45.75,4.62,40,3.21,34.49L3,33.58c-.13-.51-.22-1-.32-1.53s-.16-.9-.27-1.34,0-.71.6-.88l6.39-1.76q4-1.12,8-2.21c1.45-.39,3.61-1,5.3-1.27v0l.82,2.83.78,2.68c.17.61.31,1.23.43,1.75a1.3,1.3,0,0,0,.45.89,1.29,1.29,0,0,0,1,0l1.69-.4c1.05-.26,2.1-.51,3.16-.73.67-.15,1.36-.24,2-.33l.31,0a2.1,2.1,0,0,1,.24.41c.06.16.35,1.2.6,2.13.18.66.37,1.36.52,1.88l3.61,14.58c.18.6.37,1.29.58,2V45.8L38,42S35.36,32,35,30.49a2.11,2.11,0,0,0-1-1.31c-2.15-1.29-3-1.84-5.1-3.2-.78-.51-2.69-2-3.44-2.52s-1.29-1.23-2.34-.9c-1.82.58-3.64,1.14-5.48,1.64-3.2.86-6.41,1.68-9.62,2.49-2.28.58-4.58,1.12-6.87,1.67-.9.21-1.08.41-.94,1.33,0,.32,2.79,10.38,4.21,16.06.22.9.59,2.29,2.46,9.67Q9,63.6,11.14,71.75a1.17,1.17,0,0,0,.62.66,2.25,2.25,0,0,0,1.15,0c2.45-.63,4.88-1.4,7.35-1.93,4.89-1.06,14-3.5,18.59-4.75ZM25,24.76c2.08,1.29,4.06,2.73,6.1,4.1l1.45.94a5.72,5.72,0,0,1,.53.45,1.05,1.05,0,0,1-.3.15c-.51.13-1,.24-1.54.34l-1,.21c-1.25.24-2.5.48-3.75.7-.7.12-.8.06-1-.63-.63-2-1.16-3.77-1.73-5.79a10.13,10.13,0,0,1-.2-1.13A6,6,0,0,1,25,24.76Z" style="fill:#39393a">
          </path>
          <path d="M30,24.64c.21.69.31.75,1,.63,1.25-.22,2.5-.46,3.75-.7,0,0,.65-.14,1-.21.52-.1,1-.21,1.54-.34a1.05,1.05,0,0,0,.3-.15c-.17-.15-.34-.31-.53-.45l-1.45-.94c-2-1.37-4-2.81-6.1-4.1a6,6,0,0,0-1.42-.66,10.13,10.13,0,0,0,.2,1.13C28.87,20.87,29.4,22.64,30,24.64Z" style="fill:#fff">

        </div>
        <div class="copy-container">
         <h4>
          Drive measurable digital transformation
         </h4>
         <p>
          Nitro’s solutions reduce reliance on paper and printing, helping your business modernize daily document processes and track progress toward its digital goals.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

     </path>

     </path>

  </section>
  <section id="home-cta-section">
   <div class="row align-center text-center">
    <div class="columns medium-8">
     <h4>
      <strong>
       Improve efficiency with collaborative software
      </strong>
     </h4>
     <p>
      The
      <a href="/future-of-work-part-1">
       future of work is here
      </a>
      and businesses everywhere have had to adopt the necessary tools for remote teams to continue operating successfully. Nitro’s all-in-one software for working remotely was engineered to accelerate daily tasks—saving time and making it easier for employees to do their job—because task management is more than a to-do list.
     </p>
     <a class="button orange" href="/contact-sales">
      Contact Sales »
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

  <script>
   $(document).ready(function(){
        $('.popup-youtube').magnificPopup({
            'type':'iframe',
            'mainClass':'mfp-fade',
            'preloader':true,
            'fixedContentPos':false
        });
    });

    function backUpApplyNavCookie(){
        var docCookies = window.docCookies || "";
        var navPrefValue = docCookies.getItem('navPref');
        if(!navPrefValue){
            docCookies.setItem('navPref','business', 31536000,'/');
        } else {
            docCookies.removeItem('navPref');
            docCookies.setItem('navPref','business', 31536000,'/');
        }
    }

    backUpApplyNavCookie();
  </script>
  <script>
   var isOldIE = Nitro.Agent.isOldIE || "";
		var prev = 1;
		var $window = $(window);
		var nav = $('.scrollhide-nav');
		if(!isOldIE){ 
			$window.on('scroll', function(){
				var scrollTop = $window.scrollTop();
				nav.toggleClass('hidden', scrollTop > prev && scrollTop > 50);
				prev = scrollTop;
			});
			$('.menu-icon').click(function() {
				$('body').toggleClass("no-scroll");
				$('#mobile-nav-button').toggleClass("menu-is-open");
			});
		}
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
